item.ptxt: Use the same procedure for both front bumper reinforcement plates.
When installing the front bumper reinforcement plate, heat the front bumper cover using a heat light.

atten3.ptxt: Do not heat the front bumper cover excessively.

s2.ptxt: When using a new front bumper cover:

s3.ptxt: Clean the surface of the new front bumper cover.

s2.ptxt: When reusing the front bumper cover:

s3.ptxt: Using a heat light, heat the front bumper cover surface.
Remove the double-sided tape from the front bumper cover.
Wipe off any tape adhesive residue with cleaner.

s2.ptxt: Install a new front bumper reinforcement plate.

s3.ptxt: Using a heat light, heat the front bumper cover surface.
Remove the peeling paper from the face of the front bumper reinforcement plate.

atten4.ptxt: After removing the peeling paper, keep the exposed adhesive free from foreign matter.

s3.ptxt: Align the front bumper reinforcement plate with the mark-off line of the front bumper cover.

atten4.ptxt: Press the front bumper reinforcement plate firmly to install it.
When installing the front bumper No. 2 protector, heat the front bumper cover using a heat light.

atten3.ptxt: Do not heat the front bumper cover excessively.

s2.ptxt: When using a new front bumper cover:

s3.ptxt: Clean the surface of the new front bumper cover.

s2.ptxt: When reusing the front bumper cover:

s3.ptxt: Using a heat light, heat the front bumper cover surface.
Remove the double-sided tape from the front bumper cover.
Wipe off any tape adhesive residue with cleaner.

s2.ptxt: Install a new front bumper No. 2 protector.

s3.ptxt: Using a heat light, heat the front bumper cover surface.
Remove the peeling paper from the face of the front bumper No. 2 protector.

atten4.ptxt: After removing the peeling paper, keep the exposed adhesive free from foreign matter.

s3.ptxt: Align the front bumper No. 2 protector with the line A of the front bumper cover and front bumper No. 2 protector with the line B of the front bumper cover, and then apply the front bumper No. 2 protector in the position shown in the illustration.

atten4.ptxt: Press the front bumper No. 2 protector firmly to install it.
Use the same procedure described for the front bumper No. 2 protector.

s2.ptxt: Attach the 24 claws to install the lower No. 1 radiator grille.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT BUMPER HOLE COVER LH (w/o Fog Light)

s2.ptxt: Attach the 4 claws to install the front bumper hole cover LH.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT BUMPER HOLE COVER RH (w/o Fog Light)

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT BUMPER SIDE MOULDING LH (w/ Plated Moulding)

s2.ptxt: Attach the 5 claws to install the front bumper side moulding LH.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FRONT BUMPER SIDE MOULDING RH (w/ Plated Moulding)

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FOG LIGHT COVER LH (w/ Fog Light)

s2.ptxt: Attach the 4 claws to install the fog light cover LH.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FOG LIGHT COVER RH (w/ Fog Light)

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FOG LIGHT ASSEMBLY LH (w/ Fog Light)

s2.ptxt: Attach the 2 guides to install the fog light assembly LH.

s-1.ptxt: INSTALL FOG LIGHT ASSEMBLY RH (w/ Fog Light)

atten4.ptxt: Use the same procedure described for the LH side.
